game.name: The spy who shot me™
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Captions available, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: The spy who shot me™ is a comedy retro FPS inspired by classic shooters of the 90s.
game.shortDescriptionEn: The spy who shot me™ is a comedy retro FPS inspired by classic shooters of the 90s.

reviewHighlights.text: High quality trash. Currently on sale for nothing, but that base price is insane and is what stopped me from picking it up back in the day when it was...
more attention to detail than (insert any AAA game released in the past 5 years)
